participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and dedicated, James enjoys helping others feel their best through fashion.
participant_1.background: I take to social media to connect with my friends and family for support. I am known for my dedication and work ethic. I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid. One of my hobbies is to help people feel their best by dressing them up. I am a family man.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, Sophia has a passion for art and music that she shares with her friends.
participant_2.background: My studio is my happy place. My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank. I work for an architect firm. I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield.

content.text: Hi there! What are your interests?
Hello, I am an architect by day and musician by night.
Oh that's cool! I'm a family man and a fashion stylist.
I love fashion! Do you have a favorite designer?
My favorite designer is Christian Siriano. He makes clothes for women of all sizes.
That's amazing! I love that he includes everyone. My favorite food is lasagna. What's yours?
Mine is mac and cheese! We should have a fashion show and then a lasagna party!
That would be so much fun! We could invite our friends and family.
I love it! We'll make it happen
